original_title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Three
overview: How much bull can a Horse take?- Discover bush ringers' connections with the past and present. See how they pitch their skill & wit against huge odds in a savage land. Working with wild cattle off horseback in difficult remote terrain is a demanding and high risk operation. The ferocity and size of a wild bull does not daunt the riders zeal for a dangerous catch. Despite the front line action having many casualties, a bush ringer regards this as his sport. A sport and a life that he loves.
title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Three
